webpage.title: CTS Example Web Page
webpage.introduction: This web page is an example of what a CTS web page may look like. This is the example introduction section. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy. Got to ESPN.com to receive your prize.

section.title: Documents
section.sub-section: This is an example of a sub-section within the documents section. This element can contain mixed content. Meaning this element can contain PCDATA as well as url elements. Here is a nested link element that points to Sun's web site.
This is an example of another sub-section within the documents section.

section.title: Presentations
section.sub-section: This is an example of a sub-section within the documents section. This element can contain mixed content. Meaning this element can contain PCDATA as well as url elements. Here is a nested link element that points to Sun's web site.

list.title: List 1
list.list-element: List item 3 is a link to Sun's web page

webpage.footer: This web page created by the CTS group.
